ui.version-tooltip: Vanilla Installer allows easy installation of all supported versions of Fabulously Optimized. For outdated versions, use a different launcher or install method.
ui.isolate-profile: Use a different .minecraft folder for this version?
ui.profile-dir-placeholder: Leave blank to let the installer decide
ui.install-error: An error occurred while installing Fabulously Optimized: {{errorMessage}}
ui.downgrade-msg:
You are attempting to downgrade the Minecraft version. This is NOT SUPPORTED by Mojang or Fabulously Optimized and it may cause world corruption or crashes.
If you want to do this safely, you should backup mods, config and saves folders to a different location and delete them from your .minecraft folder.
ui.confirm-downgrade: Yes, I want to downgrade FO.
ui.confirm-exit: Fabulously Optimized is installing. Are you sure you want to exit?
ui.no-launcher: The installer was unable to detect the official Minecraft Launcher. Install the launcher or launch it once to proceed.
